meanings.definition: Fluphenazines: a group of antipsychotic drugs
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed fluphenazines to help manage the patient's schizophrenia.
meanings.sent2: Many patients with mental health conditions benefit from taking fluphenazines.
meanings.sent3: When the fluphenazines kicked in, the patient started seeing unicorns everywhere!
meanings.sent4: The effect of fluphenazines on the mind is like a gentle breeze clearing away the fog.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pills of fluphenazines were a daily reminder of the journey to recovery.

meanings.definition: Fluphenazines: medications used to treat schizophrenia
meanings.sent1: Schizophrenia patients often rely on fluphenazines to manage their symptoms.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stocked up on fluphenazines to ensure all patients had access to treatment.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that taking fluphenazines made him see dancing elephants!
meanings.sent4: In the battle against schizophrenia, fluphenazines are the warriors fighting the chaos in the mind.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacist explained the importance of taking fluphenazines regularly for stability.

meanings.definition: Fluphenazines: a type of phenothiazine drug
meanings.sent1: The new research highlighted the benefits of using fluphenazines in treating mental disorders.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often consider fluphenazines when designing treatment plans for patients.
meanings.sent3: The artist imagined a world where fluphenazines were magical potions granting clarity of thought.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of medications, fluphenazines stand out as pillars of support for mental health.
meanings.sent5: The label on the bottle warned of the potential side effects of fluphenazines.
